title: North Korea open to denuclearization: South
text:
North Korea open to denuclearization: South 1:58pm GMT - 01:59 
North Korea is willing to hold talks with the United States on denuclearization and will suspend nuclear tests while those talks are under way, the South said on Tuesday after a delegation returned from the North where it met leader Kim Jong Un.   
North Korea is willing to hold talks with the United States on denuclearization and will suspend nuclear tests while those talks are under way, the South said on Tuesday after a delegation returned from the North where it met leader Kim Jong Un.  //reut.rs/2oRCiZc
